e1.description: Everyone can learn to code! Yes, everyone! In this live event, we are going to go through all the key basics and get you started with programming as well.
e1.title: Programming for everyone

e2.title: Networking for introverts
e2.description: We know: Networking is no fun if you are an introvert person. That's why we came up with this event - it'll be so much easier. Promised!

e3.title: Networking for extroverts
e3.description: You probably need no help with networking in general. But focusing your energy correctly - that is something where most people can improve.

e4.title: Presale condo demo unit
e4.description: Staying in a condo with modern design may bring you the best conforts and security - that is even more affordable during presale.

e5.title: Night photograpy
e5.description: Walk around and capture the beauty of downtown Seattle by night - great chance to hangout with other photographers.
